alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:40AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MARINETTE AND SOUTHERN OCONTO COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM CDT... At 739 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Oconto south to Suamico, or 15 miles north of Bay Shore Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Oconto, Little Suamico, Peshtigo, Porterfield, Abrams, Stiles, Pensaukee, Lena, and Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
